channel.title: EmporiumX Official Realease
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://emporiumx.org/imgs/logo.png[/img]
EmporiumX is a new 718/742 RSPS that is ensured to give you the best gameplay possible. EmporiumX offers loads of fun through customs, mini-games, bossing, slayer, etc. Updates arrive almost daily delivering more features to explore with! This server is the right place to be due to the active staff and great community, along with some gaming features, of course. Don't miss out on your chance to be a part of the best server around! Come join us today![/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][U]Links[/U][/B] [URL=http://"http://emporiumx.org/"]Main Page[/URL] [URL=http://"http://emporiumx.org/play"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://emporiumx.org/forum/"]Forums[/URL][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][U]Features[/U][/B]
[ul][*]Custom Dungeoneering [*]Drygores [*]Custom Weapons with custom-made special Attacks [*]Monster Killing Rewards [*]Yk'Lagor the Thunderous [*]Mercernary Mage [*]Vanguard, Battle-Mage, and Trickster [*]Steadfast, Ragefires, and Glaiven Boots [*]Kalphite Ranging Armor [*]Royal Crossbow [*]Godwars [*]Nex [*]Dragon Claws [*]PKing [*]100% Skilling [*]PVM [*]AUTO-VOTE [*]Auto-Donate [*]Forums [*]VPS Hosted w/ DDOS protection [*]Nice Community [*]Dedicated Developers [*]Custom Home [*]Jadinkos [*]Glacors [*]Polypore Dungeon [*]AGS, ZGS, SGS, and BGS [*]Nice Graphics [*]5+ Minigames [*]Revenants [*]Custom Shops Zone [*]Some Specs that heal you [*]Some specs with recoil, but high damage. [*]Torva, Pernix, and Virtus [*]Custom Donator Zone [*]Reg Donor, Extreme Donor, and V.I.P [*]Armor-Repair [*]Clan-Wars [*]Vote4Rewards [*]25+ Customs [*]Dual Wield Weapons[/ul] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][U]Media[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXpolypores_zpsa6e4b9dd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXThunder_zpsd69f9b95.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXtele_zps8e1b5a16.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXshopzone_zps88950b8c.png[/img] [B][I](The picture above consists of the ::shops zone)[/I][/B] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXpvmshop_zps92c2d61a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXpolypore_zpsf9bf12b2.png[/img] [B][I](You must climb down to the Ganodermic Beasts in the above photo.)[/I][/B] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXDzone_zps0cec2c31.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXMercMAge_zpsaa57aad4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXjadinkos_zps3835cde7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXmesamunespec_zps4b759345.png[/img] [B][I](Mesamune Special Attack Above.. damages you, but usually does a great amount of damage to the target.)[/I][/B] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXHome_zps41462560.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXkbd_zps7c1c1c6e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXCustomtele_zps50534ba2.png[/img] [B][I](Above picture is the home teleport)[/I][/B] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXcgsspec_zpsa13aab93.png[/img] [B][I](Chronic Godsword special attack above.. heals you for 300 health points.)[/I][/B] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXcustoms1_zps41b28aa6.png[/img] [B][I](Above and Below pictures consist of some customs)[/I][/B] [IMG]http://i1293.photobucket.com/albums/b595/Starknathan1092/EXcustoms_zps425db1c3.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B]There are updates almost everyday consisting of fun and unique features, so stay tuned![/B]
[B]This server uses the Chronicscape source and Matrix base. [/B]
Thanks everyone for looking at this advertisement! Please, no hate comments, unless it's helpful! :)[/CENTER]

item.title: EmporiumX Official Realease
item.dc:creator: @darrien21 darrien21
item.description:
@darrien21 wrote:

[CENTER]

EmporiumX is a new 718/742 RSPS that is ensured to give you the best gameplay possible. EmporiumX offers loads of fun through customs, mini-games, bossing, slayer, etc. Updates arrive almost daily delivering more features to explore with! This server is the right place to be due to the active staff and great community, along with some gaming features, of course. Don’t miss out on your chance to be a part of the best server around! Come join us today![/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][U]Links[/U][/B]
[URL=http://“http://emporiumx.org/”]Main Page[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://emporiumx.org/play”]Webclient[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://emporiumx.org/forum/”]Forums[/URL][/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][U]Features[/U][/B]

[ul][]Custom Dungeoneering
[]Drygores
[]Custom Weapons with custom-made special Attacks
[]Monster Killing Rewards
[]Yk’Lagor the Thunderous
[]Mercernary Mage
[]Vanguard, Battle-Mage, and Trickster
[]Steadfast, Ragefires, and Glaiven Boots
[]Kalphite Ranging Armor
[]Royal Crossbow
[]Godwars
[]Nex
[]Dragon Claws
[]PKing
[]100% Skilling
[]PVM
[]AUTO-VOTE
[]Auto-Donate
[]Forums
[]VPS Hosted w/ DDOS protection
[]Nice Community
[]Dedicated Developers
[]Custom Home
[]Jadinkos
[]Glacors
[]Polypore Dungeon
[]AGS, ZGS, SGS, and BGS
[]Nice Graphics
[]5+ Minigames
[]Revenants
[]Custom Shops Zone
[]Some Specs that heal you
[]Some specs with recoil, but high damage.
[]Torva, Pernix, and Virtus
[]Custom Donator Zone
[]Reg Donor, Extreme Donor, and V.I.P
[]Armor-Repair
[]Clan-Wars
[]Vote4Rewards
[]25+ Customs
[*]Dual Wield Weapons[/ul]
[/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][U]Media[/U][/B]




[B][I](The picture above consists of the ::shops zone)[/I][/B]


[B][I](You must climb down to the Ganodermic Beasts in the above photo.)[/I][/B]




[B][I](Mesamune Special Attack Above… damages you, but usually does a great amount of damage to the target.)[/I][/B]



[B][I](Above picture is the home teleport)[/I][/B]

[B][I](Chronic Godsword special attack above… heals you for 300 health points.)[/I][/B]

[B][I](Above and Below pictures consist of some customs)[/I][/B]
[/CENTER]

[CENTER][B]There are updates almost everyday consisting of fun and unique features, so stay tuned![/B]

[B]This server uses the Chronicscape source and Matrix base. [/B]

Thanks everyone for looking at this advertisement! Please, no hate comments, unless it’s helpful! :)[/CENTER]
